ValidationRule.description: Score must be a whole number from 0-10
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Id="00e30000000bvR3"), Solutions_Engineer_Score__c!=0, Solutions_Engineer_Score__c!=1, Solutions_Engineer_Score__c!=2, Solutions_Engineer_Score__c!=3, Solutions_Engineer_Score__c!=4, Solutions_Engineer_Score__c!=5, Solutions_Engineer_Score__c!=6, Solutions_Engineer_Score__c!=7, Solutions_Engineer_Score__c!=8, Solutions_Engineer_Score__c!=9, Solutions_Engineer_Score__c!=10 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Scores must be a whole number between 0 and 10.
